description.en:
Let's go! Let's go!
----Barom Cross!!

"Superman Barom 1", born from the power of friendship, is the hero who exploded all my yearnings and dreams.
----Takao Saito


The Great Universe ---- There were two wills that continued to fight for thousands of years.
Copou, the will of peace and justice, and Doruge, the personification of evil will. 
After a fierce battle, Doruge hid in the depths of the earth and unleashed
ominous demons on the ground to destroy humanity . Copou also arrives on Earth to
thwart his evil ambitions , but he realizes that fighting Dolge head-on would produce enough energy to destroy the Earth . At that time, Copu finds Kentaro Shiratori and Takeshi Kido, who are desperately fighting to protect their classmates from Dolge's fighter Antman, and decides to entrust the future of the earth to their sense of justice and friendship. Kentaro and Takeshi, who were given can protect the earth, or rather, the entire universe from the great demon Doruge!?!!

biography.en:
Saito Takao was born on November 3, 1936 in Wakayama, Japan. He died from pancreatic cancer on September 24, 2021.

He was a member of *Gekiga Koubou* (Gekiga Factory), along artists ("gekigaka", *gekiga* authors) such as Tsuge Yoshiharu, Hirata Hiroshi or Koike Kazuo among others.

**Associated names:**
さいとうたかを
SAITO Pro, SAITO Productions
さいとう・プロダクション
